item.title: [GRATUIT] Thingiverse > tilinger > Warmaster_Siege_Mangonel [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:7091689

Id objet : 7091689

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • warmaster Machines-de-guerre-génériques

Collections pour tags :

  • warmaster Machines-de-guerre-génériques NONDL NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3
4
5

10mm mangonel for Warmaster. I made a couple of crew strips as well, for all the armies I have designed until now. To my horror I had to discover that I have lost a couple of my master blender files, including all my dwarfs I have not finished yet, so the crew is limited to what I alerady published.

The base model is fantastic in my opinion, I only made some parts more robust for 10mm.

I was already done with the design as I noticed, that the mangonel (and the bombard as well) can indeed turn during a game, but I still left this without wheels, as the illustration in the rules is also fixed.

Ballista for the Corsairs of Umber in 10mm Scale

This model is designed for use in the Lord of the Rings Battle Strategy Game. This model was designed in 10mm Scale, not the typical 28mm Scale. I'd recommend checking size before printing. This model was designed to be used with my Corsair Ship: https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:6950859

NOTE: This model has not been test printed

Orc siege Catapult in 10mm Scale

This model was made for the Lord of the Rings SBG but was designed in 10mm (epic) scale not the standard 28mm scale. The miniatures in the pictures are not included. They are minis from Wakes Emporium with a converted siege troll.

NOTE: Models not included. This model has not been test printed.

item.title: [GRATUIT] Thingiverse > TheLazyOne > Western_Kingdom___Terrain_Free_Sample [non dl]
item.description:

Prix : 0 euros

Collections pour tags :

  • warmaster Machines-de-guerre-génériques NONDL SUP

Description :

1
2
3
4
5
6
7
8

<p>The Western Kingdom - Free Sample</p>
<p>The set includes a few free .stl files from our range.</p>
<p><br>The models are provided as .stl files and are PRE-SUPPORTED. They have been extensively tested at 6mm scale.</p>
<p>The figures are meant to be printed in 6mm, 10mm (scaling at 140-150%) and possibly in 15mm (scaling at 200-220%). Since the scale of most ranges vary, we recommend users to test with the scaling until they find their preferred scaling settings.<br>A resin printer is recommended: the models shown in picture are printed at 6mm height with a SparkMaker FHD. Any budget entry resin printer will be capable to achieve te results as above.</p>
<p>GET IT FREE! <a href="https://www.myminifactory.com/object/3d-print-western-kingdom-terrain-free-sample-121489">Western Kingdom - Terrain Free Sample<br></a>GET IT FREE! <a href="https://www.myminifactory.com/object/3d-print-121709">Western Kingdom - Troops Free Sample</a></p>
<p>SAVE 18$: <a href="https://www.myminifactory.com/object/3d-print-western-kingdom-battlefield-bundle-121516">Western Kingdom - Battlefield Bundle</a></p>
<p>SAVE 6$: <a href="https://www.myminifactory.com/object/3d-print-western-kingdom-terrain-bundle-121505">Western Kingdom - Terrain Bundle</a><br>SAVE 7$: <a href="https://www.myminifactory.com/object/3d-print-western-kingdom-army-bundle-121503">Western Kingdom - Army Bundle</a></p>
<p>Discover all the Western Kingdom packs: <br><a href="https://www.myminifactory.com/object/3d-print-western-kingdom-destroyed-village-121475">Western Kingdom - Destroyed Village</a><br><a href="https://www.myminifactory.com/object/3d-print-western-kingdom-siege-camp-121483">Western Kingdom - Siege Camp</a><br><a href="https://www.myminifactory.com/object/3d-print-western-kingdom-infantry-121485">Western Kingdom - Infantry</a><br><a href="https://www.myminifactory.com/object/3d-print-western-kingdom-ranged-121488">Western Kingdom - Ranged</a><br><a href="https://www.myminifactory.com/object/3d-print-western-kingdom-cavalry-121487">Western Kingdom - Cavalry</a>

Justification du tag SUP :

~~~
<p><br>The models are provided as .stl files and are PRE-SUPPORTED. They have been extensively tested at 6mm scale.</p>
~~~

item.title: [GRATUIT] Thingiverse > dutchmogul > Flight_of_the_Wind_Dragon [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:151676

Id objet : 151676

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • warmaster Machines-de-guerre-génériques

Collections pour tags :

  • warmaster Machines-de-guerre-génériques NONDL NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3
4
5
6
7
8
9

Introducing the Wind Dragon and its valiant crew of gnomish wizards! I had so much fun deigning my Gnomedozer that I felt I needed to go bigger... (http://www.thingiverse.com/thing:150113)

This is a fairly epic print, and you'll need glue to assemble it, but I kept the pieces to a minimum. For best results, print both sets of wings and glue them together to get the framework on both sides. 

Thanks again to MakerBot for their Gnome scan which inspired these vehicle designs (I love making gnome variants, but they needed a playset). http://www.thingiverse.com/thing:137617

I'll post a separate thing for the crew with individual models and split versions. All of these guys are scaled to standard heroic-scale gaming (28mm) and the ship is scaled to accommodate their 20mm bases. 

Enjoy!
